description.english: Survive 6 nights without buying anything
description.german: Überlebe 6 Nächte, ohne etwas zu kaufen
description.french: Survivez 6 nuits sans rien acheter
description.italian: Sopravvivi 6 notti senza comprare niente
description.spanish: Sobrevive 6 noches sin comprar nada.
description.schinese: 不购买任何东西，存活6个晚上
description.japanese: 何も買わずに6日間生き延びる
description.portuguese: Sobreviva 6 noites sem comprar nada
description.polish: Przetrwaj 10 nocy bez żadnych zakupów
description.turkish: Hiçbir şey satın almadan 6 gece hayatta kal
description.brazilian: Sobreviva 6 noites sem comprar nada

description.english: Survive 10 nights without any barricades, turrets or mines
description.german: Überlebe 10 Nächte ohne Barrikaden, Geschütze oder Minen
description.french: Survivez 10 nuits sans installer de barricade, de tourelle ni de mine
description.italian: Sopravvivi 10 notti senza barricate, torrette o mine
description.koreana: 바리케이드, 포탑, 지뢰 없이 10번째 밤까지 생존
description.spanish: Sobrevive 10 noches sin barricadas, torretas ni minas.
description.schinese: 不用任何路障、炮塔或地雷，存活10个晚上
description.russian: Продержитесь 10 ночей, не устанавливая баррикады, турели и мины
description.japanese: バリケード、砲塔、地雷なしで10日間生き延びる
description.portuguese: Sobreviva 10 noites sem barricadas, torretas ou minas
description.polish: Przetrwaj 10 nocy bez żadnych barykad, wieżyczek ani min
description.turkish: Barikat, taret ve mayın kullanmadan 10 gece hayatta kal
description.brazilian: Sobreviva 10 noites sem barricadas, torretas ou minas

description.english: Survive 10 nights without taking any damage
description.german: Überlebe 10 Nächte, ohne Schaden zu erleiden
description.french: Survivez 10 nuits sans subir de dégâts
description.italian: Sopravvivi 10 notti senza subire danni
description.koreana: 어떤 피해도 받지 않고 10번째 밤까지 생존
description.spanish: Sobrevive 10 noches sin recibir daños.
description.schinese: 存活10个晚上且没有受到任何伤害
description.japanese: まったくダメージを受けずに10日間生き延びる
description.portuguese: Sobreviva 10 noites sem sofrer dano
description.polish: Przetrwaj 10 nocy bez otrzymania żadnych obrażeń
description.turkish: Hiç hasar almadan 10 gece hayatta kal
description.brazilian: Sobreviva 10 noites sem sofrer dano

description.english: Kill 8 zombies with a single sniper rifle bullet in defense mode
description.german: Töte 8 Zombies mit einer einzigen Scharfschützengewehrkugel im Verteidigungsmodus
description.french: Tuez 8 zombies d'un seul tir de fusil de précision en mode Défense
description.italian: Uccidi 8 zombi con una sola pallottola da carabina in modalità Difesa
description.koreana: 디펜스 모드에서 스나이퍼 라이플 한 발로 좀비 8마리 처치
description.spanish: Mata 8 zombis con un disparo del rifle de francotirador en modo defensa.
description.schinese: 在防御模式中，使用一颗狙击步枪子弹击杀8个僵尸
description.russian: Убейте 8 зомби одним выстрелом из снайперской винтовки в режиме «Оборона»
description.japanese: ディフェンスモードで一発のスナイパーライフル弾で8体のゾンビをキルする
description.portuguese: Mate 8 zumbis com uma única bala de fuzil de precisão no modo Defesa
description.polish: W trybie obrony zabij 8 zombiaków jednym strzałem z karabinu snajperskiego
description.turkish: Savunma modunda keskin nişancı tüfeğiyle tek atışta 8 zombi öldür
description.brazilian: Mate 8 zumbis com uma única bala de fuzil de precisão no modo Defesa

description.english: Kill 8 zombies with a single rocket in defense mode

description.french: Tuez 8 zombies d'une seule roquette en mode Défense
description.italian: Uccidi 8 zombi con un solo razzo in modalità Difesa

description.spanish: Mata 8 zombis con un cohete en modo defensa.
description.schinese: 在防御模式中，使用一枚火箭弹击杀8个僵尸
description.russian: Убейте 8 зомби одной ракетой в режиме «Оборона»

description.turkish: Savunma modunda tek bir roketle 8 zombi öldür
description.brazilian: Mate 8 zumbis com um único míssil no modo Defesa

description.english: Kill 300 zombies with shotgun in a single game in defense mode

description.italian: Uccidi 300 zombi con un fucile a pompa in una sola partita in modalità Difesa

description.spanish: Mata 30 zombis con la escopeta en una partida de modo defensa.
description.schinese: 在防御模式下的一场游戏里，使用猎枪击杀300个僵尸
description.russian: Убейте 300 зомби из дробовика за одну игру в режиме «Оборона»
description.japanese: ディフェンスモードで1ゲーム中にショットガンで300体のゾンビをキルする

displayName.english: Abandon all hope ye who enter here
displayName.german: Lasst, die ihr eintretet, alle Hoffnung fahren!

displayName.spanish: Abandonad toda esperanza los que entráis aquí
displayName.schinese: 凡入此门者，需断绝希望
displayName.japanese: すべての希望を捨てよ、汝ここより入る者よ。
displayName.portuguese: Deixai toda esperança, ó vós que entrais
displayName.polish: Porzućcie wszelką nadzieję, wy, którzy tu wchodzicie
